ReportText: Exam: XR CHEST AP OR PA ONLY INDICATION: Respiratory distress or failure requiring intubation with or without ventilator support. COMPARISON: 09/04/00. TECHNIQUE: AP semi-supine view of the chest is obtained. FINDINGS: Stable support devices. Slightly decreased lung volumes with increased atelectasis. Remaining aspects of the chest are stable. No pneumothorax or other acute complication. IMPRESSION: Slightly decreased lung volumes.
findings: FINDINGS: Stable support devices. Slightly decreased lung volumes with increased atelectasis. Remaining aspects of the chest are stable. No pneumothorax or other acute complication.
